trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
In order to be listeners in this pattern, your listener objects must implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener>.
You do not need to implement <xref:System.Windows.IWeakEventListener> on the class that is the source of the events.
Adds the specified event handler, which is called when specified source raises the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
Adds the specified listener to the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event of the specified source.
The object with the event.
The object to add as a listener.
Returns a new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
A new object to contain listeners to the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
The source object that the raises the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
The delegate that handles the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.
Removes the specified listener from the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event of the specified source.
The object with the event.
The listener to remove.
Begins listening for the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
The object with the event.
Stops listening for the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event on the specified source.
The object with the event.
